tool_description: SSG Football Clubs API allows you to search and visualize all games played in the European Football Club Cups up to date (more than 25 000 matches). The API has several different search criteria to be utilized, such as team vs country, country vs team, tournament and venue. So, you can see how a specific team have fared vs any team from any country in any tournament anywhere.
name: European Football Club Cups
title: European Football Club Cups

api_list.name: /team.php
api_list.description: Return scores for matches between a home team and all away teams.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Default = 100, Max = 1000

optional_parameters.name: VENUE
optional_parameters.description: Home, Away, Neutral

optional_parameters.name: TOURNAMENT
optional_parameters.description: Inter-Cities Fairs Cup, UEFA Champions League, UEFA Cup, UEFA Cupwinners Cup, UEFA Europa League, UEFA European Champions Cup, UEFA Intertoto Cup, UEFA Super Cup

optional_parameters.name: orderBy
optional_parameters.description: TOURNAMENT, COUNTRY_A, TEAM_A, COUNTRY_B, TEAM_B, DATE, VENUE, OUTCOME, GOALS_FOR, GOALS_AGAINST, PHASE

optional_parameters.name: pageNumber
optional_parameters.description: If pageSize is not empty then default = 1

optional_parameters.name: pageSize
optional_parameters.description: Possible values from 5 to 1000, if pageNumber is not empty then default = 25
